commands.name: build
commands.description: Run npm script: shx rm -rf dist && tsc -b

commands.name: postpack
commands.description: Run npm script: shx rm -f oclif.manifest.json

commands.name: posttest
commands.description: Run npm script: npm run lint

commands.name: prepack
commands.description: Run npm script: oclif manifest && oclif readme

commands.name: version
commands.description: Run npm script: oclif readme && git add README.md

commands.name: pub
commands.description: Run npm script: npm run build && npm publish
